laazotea.indi.server

Class INDIDeviceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.server.INDIDeviceListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    INDIClient, INDIDevice

    public abstract class INDIDeviceListener
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a listener to devices. It is used to include both usual Clients and Devices, as Drivers can also snoop Properties from other Devices according to the INDI protocol.
    Version:
    1.31, April 12, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]

        protected boolean areNonBLOBsAccepted(java.lang.String deviceName)
        Gets information about if non BLOBs updates should be sended according to the BLOB Enable rules.

        deviceName - The Device name
        Returns:
        true if non BLOBs are accepted. false otherwise.
